NewFinderAddress(address,address).notice: Emitted when the UMA Finder is changed

QuestionFlaggedForAdminResolution(bytes3.notice: Emitted when a question is flagged by an admin for emergency resolution

QuestionInitialized(bytes32,bytes,uint25.notice: Emitted when a questionID is initialized

QuestionPaused(bytes32).notice: Emitted when a question is paused by an authorized user

QuestionReset(bytes32).notice: Emitted when a question is reset

QuestionResolved(bytes32,bool).notice: Emitted when a question is resolved

QuestionSettled(bytes32,int256,bool).notice: Emitted when a question is settled

QuestionUnpaused(bytes32).notice: Emitted when a question is unpaused by an authorized user

QuestionUpdated(bytes32,bytes,uint256,ad.notice: Emitted when a questionID is updated

ResolutionDataRequested(address,uint256,.notice: Emitted when resolution data is requested from the Optimistic Oracle

emergencyReportPayouts(bytes32,uint256[].notice: Allows an authorized user to report payouts in an emergency

emergencySafetyPeriod().notice: Time period after which an authorized user can emergency resolve a condition

flagQuestionForEmergencyResolution(bytes.notice: Flags a market for emergency resolution in an emergency

getExpectedPayouts(bytes32).notice: Retrieves the expected payout of a settled question

identifier().notice: Unique query identifier for the Optimistic Oracle

ignorePrice().notice: Price that indicates that the OO does not have a valid price yet

initializeQuestion(bytes32,bytes,uint256.notice: Initializes a question on the Adapter to report on

isQuestionInitialized(bytes32).notice: Utility function that verifies if a question is initialized

pauseQuestion(bytes32).notice: Allows an authorized user to pause market resolution in an emergency

prepareAndInitialize(bytes32,bytes,uint2.notice: Utility function that atomically prepares a question on the Conditional Tokens contract         and initializes it on the Adapter

readyToRequestResolution(bytes32).notice: Checks whether or not a question can start the resolution process

readyToSettle(bytes32).notice: Checks whether a questionID is ready to be settled

requestResolutionData(bytes32).notice: Request resolution data from the Optimistic Oracle

setFinderAddress(address).notice: Allows an authorized user to update the UMA Finder address

settle(bytes32).notice: Settle/finalize the resolution data of a questionIf the OO returns the ignore price, this method resets the question, allowing new price requests

unPauseQuestion(bytes32).notice: Allows an authorized user to unpause market resolution in an emergency

updateQuestion(bytes32,bytes,uint256,add.notice: Allows an authorized user to update a question

userdoc.notice: Enables CTF resolution via UMA's Optimistic Oracle
